A Chinese teenager has died days after he was sent to an internet addiction treatment centre, reigniting fierce criticism of these institutions. The 18-year-old had sustained multiple injuries, and the centre's director and staff members have been held by police.

A man who killed himself during an armed Los Angeles standoff last week was an important witness in a sweeping corruption investigation in Indonesia, according to media reports. Johannes Marliem, 32, died of a self-inflicted gunshot wound to the head
Big game hunter trampled to death by elephant in Namibia
